creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Chair-cover of powder-blue cut velvet on cocoa-colored satin ground. The overhanging and back sections have a design of a large phoenix and sprays of peonies; the seat section, a shaped quatrefoil medallion with a large lotus blossom and clouds; the apron, two Foo dogs and he Eternal Sea. The border has a broad design of lotus blossoms and leaves. Lining of rose red silk of cloud design.
title: Chair cover
